title: About
text: I’m a 5th-year PhD student in the Shen lab at Van Andel Institute. I work on developing tools to study DNA methylation and chromatin architecture in Fallopian tube.

title: Software
text:
An R package to analyse Seahorse data.
    



An R package to query and summarize BED files fast




An R package to infer chromatin compartments from scRNA/scATAC data.
